name: TenSeconds
comment: You have got about 10 seconds to disable all gates using a metal ball camouflaged in concentric circles. You get points per gate disabled. The points vary depending on the angle of the gates. If you disable all the gates before the 10 second limit your current score will posted on leaderboard.

decls.name: metalBall
decls.comment: the metal ball to roll in the maze
